member.name: T:AllOverIt.Aws.Cdk.AppSync.AppGraphqlBase
member.summary: A base class for generating AppSync Graphql constructs.

member.name: M:AllOverIt.Aws.Cdk.AppSync.AppGraphqlBase.#ctor(Amazon.CDK.Construct,System.String,Amazon.CDK.AWS.AppSync.IGraphqlApiProps,AllOverIt.Aws.Cdk.AppSync.Mapping.MappingTemplates,AllOverIt.Aws.Cdk.AppSync.Factories.MappingTypeFactory)
member.param: Contains request and response mapping templates for datasources that are not provided a mapping type. If null then an an internal version will be created.
Contains registrations for mapping types (defined on a DataSource) that do not have a default constructor because arguments need to be provided at runtime.

member.name: M:AllOverIt.Aws.Cdk.AppSync.AppGraphqlBase.AddSchemaQuery``1
member.summary: Adds a Query definition to the AppSync GraphQL API.
member.typeparam: The interface that provides the definition for the Query.
member.returns: Returns 'this' to support a fluent syntax.

member.name: M:AllOverIt.Aws.Cdk.AppSync.AppGraphqlBase.AddSchemaMutation``1
member.summary: Adds a Mutation definition to the AppSync GraphQL API.
member.typeparam: The interface that provides the definition for the Mutation.
member.returns: Returns 'this' to support a fluent syntax.

member.name: M:AllOverIt.Aws.Cdk.AppSync.AppGraphqlBase.AddSchemaSubscription``1
member.summary: Adds a Subscription definition to the AppSync GraphQL API.
member.typeparam: The interface that provides the definition for the Subscription.
member.returns: Returns 'this' to support a fluent syntax.
